TunableList.name: TODDLER_TO_CHILD_REWARD_TRAITS
TunableList.description:
A list of reward traits that can be given to a sim when they age up from toddler to child. This is used to detect the trait on the sim so it can be shown in this dialog.
It is possible the sim doesn't have any of these traits, in that case nothing is shown.

Tunable.description: A reward trait that can be given to a sim when they age up from toddler to child.
